titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which eliminates the deduction for State and local sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Repeals specified provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which eliminate the income tax deduction for State and local sales taxes. Provides that the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 shall be applied and administered as if such provisions had not been enacted.
